Plot: A battle is brewing between the forces of good and evil, as Lilith, the most powerful vampire in the world, gathers her dark minions around her. The goddess Morrigan rises up to stop her--and with her, a circle of six.
Characters: Glenna Ward, Hoyt Mac Cionaoith, Blair Murphy, Larkin Riddock, Moira Riddock, Cian Mac Cionaoith
